CustomField.description: NOT TO BE DISPLAYED This formula convert the day of the preference in a number Monday->1,Tuesday->2,...,Sunday->7
CustomField.formula: IF ( CONTAINS(Name, "Monday"), 1, IF ( CONTAINS(Name, "Tuesday"), 2, IF ( CONTAINS(Name, "Wednesday"), 3, IF ( CONTAINS(Name, "Thursday"), 4, IF ( CONTAINS(Name, "Friday"), 5, IF ( CONTAINS(Name, "Saturday"), 6, IF ( CONTAINS(Name, "Sunday"), 7, IF ( CONTAINS(Name, "refund"), 100, 1000 ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: NOT TO BE DISPLAYED This formula convert the day of the preference in a number Monday->1,Tuesday->2,...,Sunday->7
CustomField.label: display_order_PREFERENCE_DAY_in_number
